text: Rani Kuthir Baki Itihash () is a 2006 Bangladeshi drama-mystery movieএস আই টুটুল এর সাথে ঘরোয়া আড্ডায় The movie was the directoral debut of news anchor and prominent media personality Samia Zaman. and produced by Bangladeshi satellite TV Channel NTV, their second film production. ==Accolades== ===National Film Awards (Bangladesh)=== * Won Best Singer - Asif Akbar 2006 for "Amar Majhe Nei Ekhon Ami" * Won Best Singer Samina Chowdhury 2006 for "Amar Majhe Nei Ekhon Ami" ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2006 mystery movies Category:Bengali- language movies Category:Bangladeshi movies Category:Mystery drama movies
title: Rani Kuthir Baki Itihash
